sentences.english: Zhu is being held without bond at the Montgomery County Jail.
sentences.chinese: 朱海洋正被關押於蒙哥馬利縣監獄，並不得保釋。

sentences.english: Mrs Penniman had no appetite whatever for conversation with Mrs Montgomery…
sentences.chinese: 佩尼曼太太根本沒有那種雅興去跟蒙哥馬利太太晤談。

sentences.english: Issues of the Silver International are available on the Montgomery Blair High School Web site.
sentences.chinese: 《銀泉國際》各期可見蒙哥馬利布萊爾中學網站。

sentences.english: Her refusal to give up her seat led to the Montgomery Bus Boycott.
sentences.chinese: 她拒絕讓座的行爲導致了蒙哥馬利巴士抵制運動。
